specifications.Finish: Chemical > PU Coated (front) PU coated refers to a thin layer of polyurethane applied to the fabric’s front side. This coating provides water resistance, enhances durability, creates a smooth surface texture, and offers some resistance to stains and wind. Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Chemical > PU Coated (front) There may be differences across batches of PU-coated fabrics due to variances in the color, thickness, and application of the coating. When storing the fabric, roll it up instead of folding it to prevent damage to the coated area.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Anti-Microbial Fabric with an antibacterial effect created by inserting silver into yarns or through silver nano coating. UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. Brand Yarn Aerosilver® Aerosilver is a next generation multi-functional fiber providing moisture absorbent/fast drying function with antimicrobial effects. Aerosilver is a universal yarn applications range from intimate wear to sportswear. (Specification: bit.ly/4aj8s67) Recommended Use Activewear, T-shirts
